channel.title: elasticsearch on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in elasticsearch on Vegetable Programing

item.title: elasticsearchをcentos7にインストール
item.description: インストール # rpm --import https://packages.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch # vi /etc/yum.repos.d/elasticsearch.repo ======= [elasticsearch-2.x] name=Elasticsearch repository for 2.x packages baseurl=http://packages.elastic.co/elasticsearch/2.x/centos gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://packages.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch enabled=1 # yum install elasticsearch ホストの設定 # vi /etc/elasticsearch/elasticsearch.yml ======= # network.host: 192.168.0.1 network.host: 192.168.33.10 プラグインをインストール kuromoji・・・日本語全
